author: wn.com
title: Test your smoke alarms for Fire Prevention Week (Government of British Columbia)
text: ( Source : Government of British Columbia ) SURREY - An important reminder ahead of Fire Prevention Week : working smoke alarms save lives. Fire Prevention Week officially runs from Oct. 4-10, 2015 , and it launched today with a smoke alarm
